parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Waypoints </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines the music track played on activation.

Track is a subclass name of CfgMusic. In addition, "$STOP$" (stops the current music track). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''setMusicEffect''' track </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> track: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> waypoint '''setMusicEffect''' track </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> track: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_trigger setMusicEffect "Track1"</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>[_group1,1] setMusicEffect "$STOP$"</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[createTrigger]], [[setSoundEffect]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
